titles: The tryal and condemnation of Sir John Friend, Knight for conspiring to raise rebellion in these kingdoms : in order to a French invasion : who upon full evidence was found guilty of high-treason at the sessions-house in the Old Bayly, March 23th, 1695/6.
author: Friend, John, Sir, d. 1696.
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: William --  III, --  King of England, 1650-1702 --  Assassination attempt, 1696.
